actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: Relating to the Congressional procedures that apply to any bill to implement a free-trade agreement between the United States and Mexico.

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Trade and Competitiveness Act of 1988 to prohibit the extension of fast track procedures with respect to the implementation of any trade agreement that establishes a free-trade area between the United States and Mexico. Prohibits the amendment, with specified exceptions, of free-trade area implementing bills in either the House of Representatives or the Senate.

titles.title: Relating to the Congressional procedures that apply to any bill to implement a free-trade agreement between the United States and Mexico.
